summary: This document is an email chain between FBI agents in New York and a Detective Chief Superintendent from London's Metropolitan Police, discussing updates on the Ghislaine Maxwell (GM) trial. The emails cover trial progress, witness testimony, and specific questions about UK connections, including Prince Andrew's travel on Epstein's plane.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Correspondent providing updates on the Ghislaine Maxwell trial to UK police, discussing witness testimony and trial details.

persons.name: Detective Chief Superintendent Central Specialist Crime
persons.context: UK police official from London's Metropolitan Police seeking and receiving updates on the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, particularly regarding UK connections and witnesses.

connections.person1: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office
connections.person2: Detective Chief Superintendent Central Specialist Crime
connections.description: Law enforcement counterparts sharing information about the Ghislaine Maxwell trial between US and UK agencies.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell trial begins
events.description: Trial of Ghislaine Maxwell starts with first witness testimony from Epstein's pilot.

events.title: Pilot testimony about Prince Andrew
events.description: Epstein's pilot confirms under defense questioning that Prince Andrew flew on Epstein's plane.

events.title: Expected trial closings
events.description: Defense and prosecution scheduled to give closing arguments with jury possibly receiving the case.

keyFacts: Epstein's pilot testified and confirmed that Prince Andrew flew on Epstein's plane.
UK police were actively monitoring the Maxwell trial for any London/UK connections or witnesses.
There was confusion about a potential UK witness described as a plainclothes police officer who requested anonymity.
The first victim in the trial was expected to testify about interactions with Epstein at his London residence.
The email chain shows ongoing coordination between US FBI and UK Metropolitan Police regarding the Maxwell trial.
